meanings.sent1: The procreators in the animal kingdom ensure the continuation of their species.
meanings.sent2: The procreators of the family were excited to welcome a new baby into their home.
meanings.sent3: The procreators at the zoo had a busy day with their little ones running around.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of life, the procreators sow the seeds of the future generation.
meanings.sent5: The role of procreators is vital for the survival of all living beings.

meanings.definition: Procreators: individuals who create new life through reproduction
meanings.sent1: The procreators in the forest play a crucial role in the circle of life.
meanings.sent2: As procreators, humans have the ability to bring new generations into the world.
meanings.sent3: The procreators at the farm were proud of their little piglets.
meanings.sent4: Just like the stars in the sky, procreators shine bright with the gift of life.
meanings.sent5: The bond between procreators and their offspring is unbreakable.
